name: Roy Tang
text: I feel like it’s superfluous because my mom and i dont really share the same taste in movies anymore. the only way she’d watch a star wars or marvel movie would be if richard gere was somehow cast. instead i’ll say the movie is generally family/kid friendly, if youre fine with the violence
